RighteousFury.Title: ⚡ Righteous Fury! ⚡
RighteousFury.Description: You scored a devastating hit with {weapon}!
RighteousFury.ConfirmedMessage: Additional d10 damage and critical effect!
RighteousFury.NotConfirmedMessage: The blow was powerful, but not devastating.

Stacks.Description: How many times is this condition applied?

AppliesTo.Description: Who is affected by this condition?

OriginPath.Description: Drag origin path items from the compendium to define your character's background. Each step grants unique abilities and bonuses.
OriginPath.DragHere: Drag an origin here or click Browse
OriginPath.RandomizeHint: Fill empty slots with random choices
OriginPath.RandomizeConfirm: Randomize all origin path selections? This will replace any current selections.
OriginPath.NoBonusesYet: Select origin path steps to see bonuses
OriginPath.InvalidStep: This item cannot be placed in this slot
OriginPath.ConfirmCommit: Apply this origin path to your character? This will replace your current path and apply all bonuses.
OriginPath.Name: Name
OriginPath.NoEffects: No origin path items selected. Drag items from the Origin Path compendium to build your character's background.
OriginPath.GuidedDesc: Follow the chart step by step
OriginPath.SwitchToFree: Switch to Free Selection mode - ignore path requirements
OriginPath.SwitchToGuided: Switch to Guided mode - follow path requirements
OriginPath.SelectOriginPrompt: Select an origin from the list to see its details
OriginPath.NoOriginsAvailable: No origins available for this step
OriginPath.OriginNotAvailable: This origin is not available in guided mode
OriginPath.CompleteAllChoices: Complete all required choices before committing
OriginPath.HomeWorldDesc: Where you were born and raised shapes your fundamental nature
OriginPath.BirthrightDesc: Your social position at birth determined your early opportunities
OriginPath.LureDesc: What called you to the stars and a life among them
OriginPath.TrialsDesc: A defining event that shaped who you became
OriginPath.MotivationDesc: The core drive that pushes you forward
OriginPath.CareerDesc: Your trained profession and role aboard the ship
OriginPath.DirectionChangeWarning: Changing direction will reset all current selections. Continue?
OriginPath.ChangeSelectionWarning: Changing this selection will reset the following steps: {steps}. Do you want to continue?
OriginPath.LineageDesc: Noble bloodlines may grant additional abilities and connections. This step is optional.
OriginPath.ConfirmSelectionHint: Lock in this choice and advance to the next step

Crew.OfficersDesc: Assign characters to ship roles for bonuses.

NPC.Name: Name
NPC.QuickCreateSubtitle: Generate a balanced NPC based on threat level and role
NPC.HordeModeHint: Creates an NPC with magnitude tracking instead of individual wounds
NPC.SignificantChangeWarning: Large threat change may significantly alter NPC balance

Horde.Title: Horde
Horde.ConvertWarning: This will convert the horde to a single NPC. Continue?

Validation.InvalidThreatLevel: Threat level must be between 1 and 30
Validation.InvalidCharacteristic: Characteristic values must be between 1 and 100

Tooltips.ThreatLevel: Higher threat = more dangerous. Affects recommended party size.
Tooltips.Magnitude: Horde health pool. Decreases as damage is taken.
Tooltips.DuplicateNPC: Create a copy of this NPC
Tooltips.CustomStat: Override calculated value with custom value

Import.Title: Import Stat Block
Import.Placeholder: Paste a stat block here in text or JSON format...

BatchCreate.Title: Batch Create NPCs
BatchCreate.OpenSheetsHint: Opens sheets for first 5 NPCs created

Encounter.Title: Encounter Builder
Encounter.DropHere: Drag NPCs here or click Add

Template.Name: Template Name
Template.NoTemplatesFound: No templates found matching your filters

Chat.NoItemFound: No item found on this chat card.
Chat.ItemNotFound: The item could not be found. It may have been deleted.
Chat.NoTokensTargeted: No tokens are currently targeted. Target one or more tokens to apply damage.

ArmourProperty.AutoStabilizedDesc: Built-in stabilization system for ranged weapons
ArmourProperty.HexagrammicDesc: Psychic protection runes provide +20 to resist psychic effects
ArmourProperty.BlessedDesc: Blessed by the Ecclesiarchy, provides bonus vs corruption
ArmourProperty.AgilityBonusDesc: Enhanced mobility systems provide Agility bonus

Armour.DragModification: Drag an armour modification here to install it

Modification.RestrictionsHelp: Select which armour types this modification can be applied to.

Gear.EffectHint: Describe what this item does when used (rules text, mechanical effects, etc.)
Gear.DurationHint: How long the effect lasts (for drugs, consumables, etc.)
Gear.UsesExhausted: This item has no uses remaining

WeaponQuality.AccurateDesc: This weapon is easier to fire accurately. Aim action grants +10 bonus to hit.
WeaponQuality.InaccurateDesc: This weapon is difficult to aim. User suffers -10 penalty on attacks.
WeaponQuality.ReliableDesc: This weapon is very well made and rarely jams. Only jams on a roll of 95 or higher.
WeaponQuality.UnreliableDesc: This weapon is prone to jamming. Jams on a roll of 96 or higher.
WeaponQuality.Unreliable2Desc: This weapon is extremely prone to jamming. Jams on a roll of 90 or higher.
WeaponQuality.NeverJamDesc: This weapon is of such high quality that it never jams or overheats.
WeaponQuality.BalancedDesc: This weapon is well-balanced. User gains +10 to Parry tests with this weapon.
WeaponQuality.DefensiveDesc: When wielding this weapon, user gains +15 to Parry tests.
WeaponQuality.FastDesc: Attacks with this weapon count as Half Actions instead of Full Actions.
WeaponQuality.FlexibleDesc: This weapon can be used to entangle. User gains +20 to Grapple tests.
WeaponQuality.UnbalancedDesc: This weapon is difficult to control. User suffers -10 to Parry tests.
WeaponQuality.UnwieldyDesc: This weapon requires two hands and a Full Action to attack.
WeaponQuality.TearingDesc: This weapon rips and tears through flesh. Re-roll damage dice that show 1 or 2.
WeaponQuality.RazorSharpDesc: This weapon is incredibly sharp. Ignores 1 point of Armour.
WeaponQuality.ProvenDesc: Any damage dice that roll less than X count as X instead.
WeaponQuality.FellingDesc: Reduces target's Unnatural Toughness by X for damage calculation.
WeaponQuality.CripplingDesc: If target takes damage, they suffer -X penalty to all tests until healed.
WeaponQuality.DevastatingDesc: Against hordes, reduces Magnitude by an additional X on successful hit.
WeaponQuality.BlastDesc: Weapon hits in X metre radius. All in area must dodge or take damage.
WeaponQuality.ScatterDesc: Hits additional targets within 2 metres of primary target.
WeaponQuality.SprayDesc: Can attack multiple targets in a cone. Makes separate attack rolls.
WeaponQuality.StormDesc: Can reroll missed attacks when firing on Full Auto.
WeaponQuality.ConcussiveDesc: Target must make Toughness test at -10×X or be stunned for 1 round.
WeaponQuality.CorrosiveDesc: Permanently reduces target's Armour by 1d10 on hit.
WeaponQuality.ToxicDesc: Target must make Toughness test at -10×X or take additional 1d10 damage.
WeaponQuality.HallucinogenicDesc: Target must make Willpower test at -10×X or suffer hallucinations.
WeaponQuality.SnareDesc: Target must make Agility test at -10×X or be immobilized.
WeaponQuality.ShockingDesc: Target must make Toughness test or be stunned for 1 round.
WeaponQuality.ShockDesc: Electrical damage that can arc to nearby targets in water.
WeaponQuality.BoltDesc: Fires mass-reactive explosive rounds. Effective against all targets.
WeaponQuality.ChainDesc: Chainblade weapon that tears through flesh and armour.
WeaponQuality.FlameDesc: Ignites flammable materials. Can cause targets to catch fire.
WeaponQuality.ForceDesc: Psychically-attuned weapon. Can be activated by psykers for bonus damage.
WeaponQuality.LasDesc: Laser weapon with high accuracy and armor penetration.
WeaponQuality.MeltaDesc: At half range or less, rolls extra d10 for penetration and damage.
WeaponQuality.PlasmaDesc: Superheated plasma weapon. Can be overcharged for increased damage.
WeaponQuality.PowerDesc: Power field weapon that disrupts molecular bonds.
WeaponQuality.PowerFieldDesc: Surrounded by a disruption field that penetrates armour.
WeaponQuality.PrimitiveDesc: Against armour higher than X, weapon only inflicts 1d10-3 damage.
WeaponQuality.GrenadeDesc: Thrown weapon. Can bounce to reach targets around corners.
WeaponQuality.LauncherDesc: Fires grenades or missiles at long range.
WeaponQuality.IndirectDesc: Can fire at targets not in line of sight with spotter. Requires X actions.
WeaponQuality.HaywireDesc: Disrupts machines and electronics. Causes X hits to constructs.
WeaponQuality.OverheatsDesc: On roll of 91+, weapon overheats and cannot fire for 1 round.
WeaponQuality.OverchargeDesc: Can increase damage by X but weapon gains Overheats quality.
WeaponQuality.RechargeDesc: Weapon requires Full Action to recharge between shots.
WeaponQuality.MaximalDesc: Can overcharge for +2d10 damage but weapon gains Overheats.
WeaponQuality.SanctifiedDesc: Blessed weapon. +2 damage against daemons and warp entities.
WeaponQuality.TaintedDesc: Corrupted weapon. May cause Corruption points on use.
WeaponQuality.DaemonWepDesc: Weapon bound with a daemon. Extremely dangerous to wield.
WeaponQuality.DaemonbaneDesc: Gains Vengeful (8) quality when used against daemons.
WeaponQuality.WarpWeaponDesc: Ignores physical armour. Attacks target's Willpower.
WeaponQuality.WitchEdgeDesc: Psychically resonant blade. Psykers can channel powers through it.
WeaponQuality.RuneWepDesc: Engraved with protective runes. +10 to resist psychic powers.
WeaponQuality.GaussDesc: Necron technology. Strips away matter at molecular level. Righteous Fury triggers on 9 or 10.
WeaponQuality.GravitonDesc: Manipulates gravity. Concussive and Crippling against most targets.
WeaponQuality.NecronWepDesc: Alien technology. Ignores most forms of protection.
WeaponQuality.SmokeDesc: Creates smoke cloud of X metre radius. Blocks line of sight.
WeaponQuality.LivingAmmunitionDesc: Fires living organisms. May have unpredictable effects.
WeaponQuality.TwinLinkedDesc: Two weapons firing in unison. Can reroll failed attack.
WeaponQuality.GyroStabilisedDesc: Stabilization system. Reduces penalties for moving and shooting.
WeaponQuality.VengefulDesc: Righteous Fury triggers on rolls of X or higher on damage dice.
WeaponQuality.LanceDesc: Designed for mounted combat. +1d10 damage when charging.
WeaponQuality.DecayDesc: Living targets that take Critical Damage must make Toughness test at -10×X or suffer disease.
WeaponQuality.IrradiatedDesc: Target hit must make Toughness test at -10×X or suffer radiation poisoning.
WeaponQuality.ReactiveDesc: Can parry ranged attacks as if they were melee attacks.
WeaponQuality.UnstableDesc: May explode catastrophically if weapon jams.
WeaponQuality.VolatileDesc: Extremely dangerous if mishandled. Plasma weapons with this quality risk catastrophic failure.
WeaponQuality.IntegratedWeaponDesc: Built into armour or body. Cannot be disarmed.
WeaponQuality.OgrynProofDesc: Specially reinforced for use by Ogryns and large creatures.
WeaponQuality.SMWepDesc: Designed for Space Marines. Difficult for normal humans to use.
WeaponQuality.CustomisedDesc: Modified for specific purpose. Effects vary.
WeaponQuality.SPDesc: Special property. See weapon description for details.
WeaponQuality.CleansingFireDesc: Purifying flames that deal additional damage to unholy targets.

RT.Reload.Title: Reload Weapon
RT.Reload.OutOfTurnWarning: It is not your turn. Reload anyway? This will not track action economy.

RT.Combat.Action.StandardAttackDesc: Make one melee or ranged attack.
RT.Combat.Action.CalledShotDesc: Attack a specific location on your target with a –20 to WS or BS.
RT.Combat.Action.AllOutAttackDesc: +20 to WS, cannot Dodge or Parry.
RT.Combat.Action.SemiAutoBurstDesc: +10 to BS, additional hit for every two degrees of success.
RT.Combat.Action.FullAutoBurstDesc: +20 to BS, additional hit for every degree of success.
RT.Combat.Action.SuppressingFireDesc: Force opponents to take cover, –20 to BS.
RT.Combat.Action.OverwatchDesc: Shoot targets coming into a set kill zone, –20 to BS.
RT.Combat.Action.MultipleAttacksDesc: Attack more than once in the same round—requires two weapons or a talent.
RT.Combat.Action.MoveDesc: Move up to your movement as a Half Action or twice your movement as a Full Action.
RT.Combat.Action.RunDesc: Move triple, enemies –20 BS and +20 WS.
RT.Combat.Action.DisengageDesc: Break off from melee and move.
RT.Combat.Action.StandMountDesc: Stand up or mount a riding animal.
RT.Combat.Action.DodgeDesc: Test Dodge to negate a hit.
RT.Combat.Action.ParryDesc: Test Weapon Skill to negate a hit.
RT.Combat.Action.AimDesc: +10 bonus to hit as a Half Action or +20 to hit as a Full Action on your next attack.
RT.Combat.Action.DelayDesc: Before your next Turn take any Half Action.
RT.Combat.Action.FeintDesc: Opposed WS Test, if you win, your next attack cannot be Dodged or Parried.
RT.Combat.Action.GrappleDesc: Affect a Grappled opponent or escape from a Grapple.
RT.Combat.Action.DefensiveStanceDesc: Gain an additional Reaction, opponents suffer –20 to WS.
RT.Combat.Action.BraceHeavyDesc: Prepare to fire a heavy weapon.
RT.Combat.Action.KnockDownDesc: Try and knock an opponent to the ground.
RT.Combat.Action.ManoeuvreDesc: Opposed WS Test, if you win, move enemy 1 metre.
